rules: Rule1: Either the legislation is under expedited review, or if the drug passes the safety test, then the drug meets the standards set by the legislation.
Rule2: Either the drug is recalled, or in the case that it is not true that the game necessitates a skill, the drug is on the black market.
Rule3: If there is quality control in drug manufacturing, then the drug is not recalled.
Rule4: Under the condition that a patent is granted for the drug, the company holds exclusive rights to the drug.
Rule5: Whenever the company holds exclusive rights to the drug, the drug is not counterfeit.

Rule6: Either a violation is found at the manufacturing site, or if the regulatory agency conducts an audit of the manufacturing site, then, provided the drug development is within the clinical trial time period, either the legislation approves the drug or the legislation bans the drug.
Rule7: The manufacturing site passes the inspection, or a warning is issued to the manufacturing site.
Rule8: Given that the game necessitates a skill, if the chemist possesses the skill of synthesis, then the company's profit margin is high.
Rule9: A warning being issued to the manufacturing site ensures that a violation is not found at the manufacturing site.
Rule10: The certification of the manufacturing site being renewed leads to the outcome that a violation is not found at the manufacturing site.
Rule11: Compliance being verified at the manufacturing site implies its certification is renewed.
Rule12: The company filing an appeal against the license suspension requires that the license of the manufacturing site is suspended.
Rule13: If the manufacturing site takes corrective action for the violation, then, assuming the manufacturing site passes the inspection, compliance is verified there.
Rule14: The regulatory board scheduling a hearing for the appeal implies the company has filed an appeal against the license suspension.
Rule15: Either the regulatory board schedules a hearing for the appeal, or remediation is completed at the manufacturing site.
Rule16: Remediation being completed at the manufacturing site means the manufacturing site takes corrective action for the violation.
Rule17: If Congress enacts a legislative change to drug policy, then the FDA issues new regulations for drug approval.
Rule18: The legislation approving the drug necessitates that the game necessitates a skill.
Rule19: The NIH initiating research for drug development leads to Congress increasing funding for the NIH.
Rule20: Congress increasing funding for the NIH implies that, if the FDA issues new regulations for drug approval, then either the legislation approves the drug or the legislation bans the drug.
Rule21: Under the condition that the legislation bans the drug, the game necessitates a skill.
Rule22: If the drug development is within the clinical trial time period, then the drug passes the safety test.

Rule23: The regulator supervising the project implies that, if the project is funded for drug development, then, assuming the drug development is within the clinical trial time period, either the legislation approves the drug or the legislation bans the drug.
Rule24: The drug meeting the standards set by the legislation results in either the legislation approving the drug or the legislation banning the drug.
Rule25: The game not necessitating a skill leads to the drug being counterfeit.
Rule26: If the game does not necessitate a skill, then a patent is granted for the drug.
facts: Fact1: The chemist possesses the skill of synthesis.
Fact2: There is quality control in drug manufacturing.
Fact3: The regulatory agency conducts an audit of the manufacturing site.
Fact4: Congress enacts a legislative change to drug policy.
Fact5: The NIH initiates research for drug development.
Fact6: The drug development is within the clinical trial time period.
Fact7: The project is funded for drug development.
Fact8: The regulator supervises the project.
Fact9: It is not the case that the legislation is under expedited review.
Fact10: The drug is not on the black market.
Fact11: The license of the manufacturing site is not suspended.

question: The company's profit margin is high.
